1.12.2.1.0.2: jabelar: Added ability to burn entities. Got configuration options fully working.
1.12.2.1.0.3: jabelar: Various code clean up and bug fixes.
1.12.2.1.0.4: jabelar: Now supports mod blocks that emit light.
1.12.2.1.0.5: jabelar: Now supports EntityItems emitting light. Fixed numerous bugs.
1.12.2.1.0.6: jabelar: Fixed issue with mods where blocks have dynamic lighting.
1.12.2.1.0.7: jabelar: Fixed issue with lingering light after burning stops.
1.12.2.1.0.8: jabelar: Fixed compatibility issue with mods like Tinkers Construct that had light-emitting blocks without registered item block.
1.12.2.1.0.9: jabelar: Got rid of some console spam left over from debugging.
1.12.2.1.0.10: jabelar: Flame enchantments can now give light, as can any living entity holding a light source.
1.12.2.1.0.11: jabelar: Fixed compatibility issue with Better Records mod.
1.12.2.1.0.12: jabelar: Fixed issue with fences connecting to the invisible light blocks.
1.12.2.1.0.13: jabelar: Tried to do major performance improvement. Hope I didn't introduce new bugs!
1.12.2.1.0.14: jabelar: Fixed a concurrent modification error introduced in 1.0.13. Thanks V01dWalker for suggesting fix.
1.12.2.1.0.15: jabelar: Another attempt at fully fixing the concurrent modification error.
